column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////Visited the Houston area during the holidays and decided to check this spot out. If you're looking for a moderately quiet dinner with family
column2: this is not your spot! The music can come across as too loud for some. However
column5: and catching up with friends. The steak was AMAZING and I regret not ordering it for myself. The salmon barbecue was good. Needed a little rice/mashed potato on the side
column6: but it was flavorful. For dessert
column7: save your money and don't buy the churros. The apple pie was the saving grace for the night ! Shoutout to Henry for holding down our table with his wonderful customer service !!
